name: untRACEable
description:
This is my entry to LudumDare41.

There were a few mechanics that I didn't get to implement, but I'm happy with how things ended up.  There's more than one level, and you can actually advance between them!

Things to Know;

  1. Make it round the track as quickly as possible, without alerting the watchers!
  2. If you're seen for more than 3 seconds at a time, you have to restart the current lap.

Controls:

  • W/Up: Accelerate
  • A/Left and D/Right: Steer
  • S/Down: Brake

Things I Didn't Finish:

  • Power-ups (e.g. Stealth Mode, Emergency Brake)
  • Multiplayer (hahahaha)

Acknowledgements:

  • Forvertz Font by Vladimir Nikolic (http://www.1001fonts.com/forvertz-font.html)
  • Art from Kenney racing pack (https://kenney.nl/assets/racing-pack)
